<!-- Full-stack web application for Draft Marketing - Chiapas marketing agency -->

## Project Overview
Production-ready web application for Draft Marketing, a marketing agency based in Comitán de Domínguez, Chiapas, Mexico.

## Architecture
- **Frontend**: React 18 + JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, React Three Fiber, Vite
- **Backend**: Node.js + Express.js with security middleware
- **Database**: JSON-based data storage for portfolio/services
- **Deployment**: Docker + Docker Compose with Nginx

## Development Guidelines
- Focus on Mexican market and Chiapas regional context
- Use Spanish language for user-facing content
- Implement advanced animations and professional design
- Follow security best practices for production deployment
- Optimize for SEO and performance
